entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 19 January 2023
